scenarios.name: Critical BTC Position Limit Breach
scenarios.description: BTC position exceeds limit by 25% for over 4 hours during market volatility
scenarios.narrative: Following the spot ETF approval, BTC surged 15% in 24 hours. Our trading desk increased position beyond approved limits to capture momentum. Position has been over limit for 5 hours.

scenarios.name: ETH Volatility Spike During Upgrade
scenarios.description: ETH volatility spikes during network upgrade event
scenarios.narrative: The Dencun network upgrade has triggered significant ETH price movement. 24-hour realized volatility has exceeded our 30% threshold by 73%.

scenarios.name: Major Exchange Credit Downgrade
scenarios.description: Primary exchange counterparty downgraded from A to BBB
scenarios.narrative: Moody's downgraded CryptoExchange Global from A to BBB citing regulatory investigations and governance concerns. Our exposure is $8.5M across spot and derivatives.

scenarios.name: EUR/USD Exposure Limit Breach
scenarios.description: EUR exposure exceeds limit due to client flow
scenarios.narrative: A large EUR-denominated client payment pushed our EUR/USD exposure 42% over the approved limit. Treasury recommends immediate hedging action.

scenarios.name: Operating Account Cash Shortfall
scenarios.narrative: Main operating account is $4.2M (35%) below forecast due to delayed client receivables and accelerated vendor payments. Payroll is in 3 days.

scenarios.name: Debt Service Coverage Ratio Breach
scenarios.narrative: Q4 2025 DSCR calculation shows 1.15x vs required 1.25x. Revenue shortfall and timing of debt payments drove the breach. 30-day cure period applies.

scenarios.name: Prime Broker Settlement Failure
scenarios.narrative: A $2.1M BTC purchase from Prime Broker Alpha has failed settlement twice due to collateral shortfall on their side. Our position remains undelivered.

demo_flow.description: Recommended order for demonstrating the system

steps.suggested_rationale: Given the critical severity and 5-hour duration during unusual market conditions, this requires CFO review before any position changes.
The Dencun upgrade creates asymmetric risk. Activating hedges protects downside while maintaining core position exposure.
Regulatory concerns warrant reducing exposure. Maintain minimum required balance for operations while moving excess to higher-rated venues.
Payroll priority requires immediate action. Sweep from money market accounts while investigating forecast variance root cause.
Strong banking relationship and no prior waivers supports negotiation. Prepare financial projections showing Q1 recovery.
